column4: Hi, I think I figured out what happened to my sound.  I think I updated to the .11 kernel using the ubuntu installer.  The modules I need for the sound card... I see them in the .10 module directory, but they don't exist in the .11 directory
I see it in .10, not in .11.  How do I get them in the .11 kernel? just run the alsa-source drivers?
